channel.title: Home on Custom Twemoji API
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Custom Twemoji API

item.title: GET `/faces`
item.description: Use this endpoint to find which Twemojis are supported as faces. Knowing whether a Twemoji is supported as a face can help in formulating other requests that don't fail. Arguments Name Required Type Default twemoji_version ‚ùå String 13.1.0 Chart.platform.disableCSSInjection = true; function getCanvas(id){ return document.

item.title: üíª  Running Locally
item.description: Clone the API repository (ZIP download) Install Ruby if you haven't already: www.ruby-lang.org (version) Install Bundler if you haven't already: gem install bundler Install Ruby dependencies with bundler: bundle Start application Use Shotgun if you want reloading with code changes: shotgun -p 9292 Otherwise use Rack: rackup Go to http://localhost:9292 in a browser to ensure it redirects to https://github.com/custom-twemoji/custom-twemoji-api Stop application: Ctrl + C

item.title: GET `/faces/features`
item.description: Use this endpoint to view the layers of Twemojis that are supported as faces indexed by features. Arguments Name Required Type Default twemoji_version ‚ùå String 13.1.0 Chart.platform.disableCSSInjection = true; function getCanvas(id){ return document.getElementById(id) }; var dataTally = ["1"].map(value = parseInt(value)); var labels = ["

item.title: GET `/faces/layers`
item.description: Use this endpoint to view the features of Twemojis that are supported as faces indexed by layers. Arguments Name Required Type Default twemoji_version ‚ùå String 13.1.0 Chart.platform.disableCSSInjection = true; function getCanvas(id){ return document.getElementById(id) }; var dataTally = ["1"].map(value = parseInt(value)); var labels = ["

item.title: GET `/faces/{base_emoji}`
item.description: Use this endpoint to build a custom Twemoji using one as a base. Arguments Name Required Type Default base_emoji ‚úÖ String none head ‚ùå String base emoji cheeks ‚ùå String base emoji mouth ‚ùå String base emoji nose ‚ùå String base emoji eyes ‚ùå String base emoji eyewear ‚ùå String base emoji headwear ‚ùå String base emoji other ‚ùå String base emoji order ‚ùå String head,cheeks,mouth,nose,eyes,eyewear,headwear,other output ‚ùå String JSON file_format ‚ùå String SVG renderer ‚ùå String N/A due to SVG file format size ‚ùå Integer N/A due to SVG file format padding ‚ùå Integer 0 background_color ‚ùå String transparent filename ‚ùå String key-value pairs twemoji_version ‚ùå String 13.

item.title: ‚úèÔ∏è  Contributing
item.description: This project is open for anyone to contribute or raise issues. Before contributing a large change, please raise an issue first to confirm it fits within the scope of the API. Fork the API repository Follow the steps on the Running Locally page Make and test changes locally Run Rubocop to check the formatting of files: rubocop When satisfied with your changes, open a pull request into the main branch including screenshots of your testing evidence
